actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on July 22, 2024.

The House received a communication from Joseph C. Picolla, Inspector General. Pursuant to Rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives, Mr. Picolla notified the House that he had been served with a subpoena for documents and testimony issued by the Superior Court for the District of Columbia, and that after consultation with the Office of General Counsel, he had determined that compliance with the subpoena is not consistent with the privileges and rights of the House.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. Chris Kellerman, S.J., Jesuit Conference of Canada and the United States, Washington, DC.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Larry Bucshon to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
